name: Angular CRM Dashboard
description: Build a comprehensive CRM dashboard with Angular
prompt:
Create an Angular CRM dashboard with:
- Customer management system
- Sales pipeline tracking
- Lead management and scoring
- Analytics and reporting
- Task and activity tracking
- Email integration
- Document management
- Team collaboration features
- Mobile-responsive design
- Role-based access control

Requirements:
- Use Angular 15+ with standalone components
- Implement NgRx for state management
- Add data-testid attributes for testing
- Include proper TypeScript types
- Ensure accessibility compliance
- Add comprehensive error handling
- Implement security best practices
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features

name: Angular Project Management Tool
prompt:
Create an Angular project management tool with:
- Project creation and management
- Task assignment and tracking
- Gantt chart visualization
- Team collaboration features
- File sharing and version control
- Time tracking and reporting
- Budget management
- Milestone tracking
- Calendar integration
- Resource allocation

Requirements:
- Use Angular Material for UI components
- Implement RxJS for reactive programming
- Add data-testid attributes for testing
- Include proper TypeScript support
- Ensure responsive design
- Add comprehensive validation
- Implement real-time updates
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features

name: Angular Banking Dashboard
description: Build a secure banking dashboard application
prompt:
Create an Angular banking dashboard with:
- Account overview and balances
- Transaction history and categorization
- Budget tracking and alerts
- Bill payment scheduling
- Investment portfolio management
- Security features and authentication
- Financial reporting and analytics
- Mobile check deposits
- Fraud detection alerts
- Customer support integration

Requirements:
- Implement strict security measures
- Use Angular Guards for route protection
- Add data-testid attributes for testing
- Include comprehensive TypeScript types
- Ensure PCI compliance
- Add encryption for sensitive data
- Implement proper error handling
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features

name: Angular Learning Platform
prompt:
Create an Angular learning platform with:
- Course catalog and enrollment
- Video lesson player with bookmarks
- Interactive quizzes and assessments
- Progress tracking and certificates
- Discussion forums and messaging
- Instructor dashboard
- Analytics and reporting
- Content management system
- Subscription management
- Mobile-responsive design

Requirements:
- Use Angular Universal for SSR
- Implement proper routing and lazy loading
- Add data-testid attributes for testing
- Include comprehensive TypeScript support
- Ensure accessibility compliance
- Add progressive web app features
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features

name: Angular Healthcare Portal
prompt:
Create an Angular healthcare portal with:
- Patient profiles and medical records
- Appointment scheduling system
- Telemedicine video consultations
- Prescription management
- Lab results and reports
- Bill payment and insurance
- Doctor directory and reviews
- Health tracking and monitoring
- Secure messaging with providers
- Emergency contact management

Requirements:
- Implement HIPAA compliance
- Use Angular Security for authentication
- Add data-testid attributes for testing
- Include comprehensive encryption
- Ensure accessibility compliance
- Add audit logging
- Implement proper error handling
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features
